duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop sales strategies and growth initiatives across all categories, track store performance, and achieve sales targets.
Implement and monitor clienteling strategies to build long-term customer relationships and achieve business goals.
Conduct team development and recruitment, providing consistent and timely feedback to maximize performance.
Manage daily operational tasks, including payroll, staffing, scheduling, and inventory management.
Interact and communicate with Lead Supervisor and Store Manager, ensuring alignment with Coach's standards and values.
Maintain interior and exterior upkeep of the building, ensuring esthetic and safety requirements are met.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; college degree preferred.
